text: Aey Nabi, momino ko jung par ubharo. Agar tum mein se bees (twenty) aadmi saabir (who persevere) hon to do saw (two hundred) par gaalib aayenge, aur agar saw (hundred) aadmi aisey hon to munkireen e haqq mein se hazaar (thousand) aadmiyon par bhari rahenge, kyunke woh aisey log hain jo samajh nahin rakhte
